1.title: The Chefsters Concoct Better Burgers
1.plot: The Chefsters all gather at Charlie's house. Scrub tries to hide some fast food burgers and Meggie wants one. Chefonna tells the gang about the bad ingredients in some fast food. They decide to they are not about to give up one of their favorite foods: hamburgers.

2.title: The Chefsters Plan a Pizza Party
2.plot: The Chefsters learn the early Greeks made flat bread topped with oils, spices and other things long before the discovery of tomatoes or the Italians named it pizza! The Chefsters learn how a Queen made pizza socially acceptable which eventually lead to your local pizza parlor. The gang picks out healthy toppings for individualizing their pizzas. Join The Chefsters and learn how you can have your own pizza party.

3.title: The Chefsters Get Corny
3.plot: The Chefsters focus on harmful sugars sometimes hidden in the healthiest of foods. The gang discovers one of these harmful sugars, High Fructose Corn Syrup, is worst for your health than other more familiar sugars. The Chefsters learn about thousands of products containing corn. Join The Chefsters as they prepare Corn on the Cob.

4.title: The Chefsters Discover Wolf Peaches
4.plot: The Chefsters discover the most interesting fact about tomatoes is not the question; are they a fruit or vegetable, but their name means Edible Wolf Peach and were used to ward off Werewolves. The Chefsters learn the nutritional value of tomatoes, the most popular fruit in the world. Join The Chefsters as they prepare a healthier recipe for Spaghetti and Meatballs.

5.title: The Chefsters Find the Egg of the Ages
5.plot: The Chefsters tackle one of the earliest foods available to man, the egg. Although the egg is packaged in the most efficient manner possible, the crew wonders at all the different shapes, sizes and colors. They focus on the harm done to the human system by an overabundance of Cholesterol in the blood steam. Join The Chefsters as they learn how to handle eggs safely, boil eggs and prepare Breakfast Tacos.

6.title: The Chefsters Chase Chicken Chow Down
6.plot: The Chefsters learn the chicken is one of our oldest domesticated animals and they descend from the Asian Red Jungle Fowl. Chicken, as Mr. C points out, may be prepared more than a zillion different ways. Chefonna points out that sometimes food may not be what you think it is, such as chicken fried steak. Join The Chefsters as they prepare Roasted Red Jungle Fowl.

7.title: The Chefsters do la Soup de Jour
7.plot: The Chefsters learn about one of man's most important inventions, the pot. With the pot, they see how man could place in water and just about any meat or vegetable to make soup. The Chefsters learn how to make a simple soup stock and prepare Chicken Noodle Soup. Soups UP!

8.title: The Chefsters Have Gone Fishin
8.plot: The Chefsters find out man has been telling "the one that got away" fishing jokes for about 40,000 years. Chefonna informs Scrub that the fast food fish sandwich he brought over is not as healthy as it may appear. The Chefsters learn about fish and have a debate over whether squid is food or bait.

9.title: The Chefsters Breaking Fast
9.plot: The Chefsters are surprised to learn breakfast does not mean jumping out of bed and heading off to school. They find out breakfast is when you break the involuntary fast of sleep. Scrub has to choose between a candy bar and exercising it off. The Chefsters cook-up some oatmeal for the fast that is broken with the most important meal of the day.

10.title: The Chefsters Attack Snacks
10.plot: The Chefsters decide its snack time. Scrub pulls out a granola bar and tells everyone he is eating health food. Chefonna informs Scrub that healthy sounding food can often be full of unhealthy ingredients. The Chefsters also learn that microwave popcorn can have unwanted ingredients and make homemade popcorn on the stove.

11.title: The Chefsters Find the Veggie Rainbow
11.plot: The Chefsters discover that vegetables provide many nutrients and minerals our bodies need. They also learn a healthy diet should consist of a vast array of colored vegetables. Join The Chefsters as they search for the veggie rainbow and stir up some Stir Fry Vegetables.

12.title: The Chefsters Divvy it Up
12.plot: The Chefsters learn the most important rule of healthy eating is portion control. Chefonna shows Scrub the most overlooked item on a nutrition facts label is the servings per container. The Chefsters do not prepare a meal but discuss the proper way to practice portion control when dining out.

13.title: The Chefsters in 'The Carbo Gang'
13.plot: The Chefsters portray Pila Pasta, Bready Bleacher, Richy Rice and the Potato-Ater in The Carbo Gang. They are pursued by Mr. C as Inspector De Carbo. The gang learns both the good and the bad about carbohydrates. Join The Chefsters as they make an all time favorite, healthier macaroni and cheese.

imdb.plot outline: Audiences join Charlie Cocinero and his friends as they become Chefsters, official members of an online community of health-conscious kids. Each episode finds Charlie and friends learning about nutrition and healthier recipes under the careful supervision of his dad, Mr. C., whose bumbling ways make him an easy target for the kids' jokes.
imdb.title: The Chefsters
plot: Dedicated to helping children live happier, healthier lives through nutrition education.::Anonymous
